text: My university internet have blocked <http://turing.ml|turing.ml> - is that a common occurrence? Not really ideal for Turing if that’s the case

elements.text: - is that a common occurrence? Not really ideal for Turing if that’s the case

text:
No, that sounds like your university's fault. I think the certificate was expired a while back, so maybe that had something to do with it. Or maybe they block non-standard domains (incredibly stupid but...).

Either way you should tell IT.
